original_title: New NATO commander, military chiefs reaffirm Ukraine support in virtual meeting | Fox News
article_summary: NATO military leaders reaffirm support for Ukraine's security during a virtual meeting, discussing potential peace guarantees amidst Trump's efforts to arrange a Putin-Zelenskyy summit. The discussions emphasize the alliance's focus on a "just, credible and durable peace" and praise the "relentless courage" of Ukrainian forces. However, Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov criticizes these discussions without Moscow's involvement.</s>
